title: Bug 6410 - File appears dirtied but not changed, code assist does not appear
description: When using code assist, the file appears to be dirtied even though no changes have been made. Additionally, code assist does not appear.
OB: When using code assist, the file appears to be dirtied even though no changes have been made. Code assist does not appear.
EB: When using code assist, the file should not appear dirtied if no changes have been made. Code assist should appear as expected.
SR:
1. Open the file in the IDE.
2. Trigger the code assist feature.
3. Verify that the file appears dirtied even though no changes have been made.
4. Check if code assist does not appear.
